short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more Fake RRPs and Brand names at Bestsecret.com - Only real prices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extension helps you (or your loved ones) save money!
With Discounts up to 80% on the RRP Bestsecret.com is a Paradise for Bargain-hunters. But this will often lead to buying many things you don't need. 

This Extension will only show you the real prices and replace the brand name with "do you really need this?". This will help you (or your loved ones) to overcome the bargain hunting!

Enjoy!

More Features are planned for the future:
- custom replacement text for brand names
